Bit Rate's Stage.title: Raising The Sun
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Welcome to PonyFest Online!  Start out the day with a few of our friends from Europe as they kick things off with a brief welcome and introduction to PFO.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Gaming for Ponies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Ever wondered just how many options you have if your looking for the most awesome games but want ponies in them? Wonder no more! In this Panel will be highlighting and showcasing some of the most amazing choices and be playing some of course to get Ponies hyped! We have original games, games with ponies modded into them and many more ways that Pastel Ponies have invaded the gaming world and this Alicorn will be your guide!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Equestria at War
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists:
VoidTemplar - VoidTemplar2000#4424
Podrick Equus#0134
Big Saij#1580
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Equestria at War is a total conversion mod for a popular World War II Grand Strategy Game called Hearts of Iron IV. The mod recreates the world of Friendship is Magic in an era of rapid industrialization, while expanding upon the show's themes of conflict, diplomacy, and magic. We will be exploring the world of Equestria, Hippogriffia, and over 70 other nations appropriate to the setting. Join us for an in-depth look at what this game has to offer.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Equestria's Next Top Artist
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists:
RiffPonies!
Thoth Penswell - Thoth#0070
Acesential - acesential#0451
Nevaylin - Nevaylin#8124
Other artists TBD
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Art is subjective...unless you're drawing PONIES, of course! Join the RiffPonies crew and an all-star cast of your FAVORITE My Little Pony fan-artists as they clash for artistic supremacy in a goofy gauntlet of art-based party games...with YOU as the judge! Join the laughs, be an art critic, and help decide who truly is "Equestria's NEXT Top Artist"!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: How to make music with Pony vocal chops
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Everyone knows how to download and open up FL studio, but are you familiar of the methods on how to create vocal chops? Sit down for an hour with SOUND BANDIT to explore the magical world of pony vocal chops! Learn the history and methodology of chops, and see first-hoof examples of how to make your own chops!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Makeup 101
Bit Rate's Stage.description: New to makeup and don't know where to begin? Come and join an experienced cosplayer as she goes over the basics of what to look for and how to apply makeup.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Cosplay/Charity
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Come see the amazing cosplayers in our community and have an opportunity to donate to a worthy cause as well.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Q&A with Koa
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Koa both makes her own music and collaborates with many of the other musicians in the fandom with her distinct style.  Join us for a Q&A session.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Playing with Lasers with My Little Ties
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Laser etching ponies onto various metal things! Turning steel different color with lasers, and etching mugs, cups, and holiday ornaments, and more!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: The Evolution of Pony Conventions (and Con-goers)
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists:
Lycan - Lycanl#1401
Larscis - Larscis#0001
Foal Papers - foalpapers#7341
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Lycan, Larscis and Foal Papers: Three veterans of the fandom with over 25 years of ponycon experience between them talk about how ponycons have evolved over time. They will discuss early fandom in 2010s to current and future conventions in 2022 and beyond!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Painting and Ponies: Digital Version!
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Are you into painting? Or just want to vibe? Well Painting and Ponies is for you! Join CosmicKeyframe as she gives a detailed step by step on a beautiful painting, utilizing surprisingly simple techniques to bring you a wonderful piece! And who knows, you may find a new hobby!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Drawing Hacks With MidPrem
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Ever wonder how creative minds stay on top of their game? Turns out, we're all a bunch of con artists! Learn how to procrastinate, panic, and still look amazing on any canvas with MidnightPremiere!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Izzy Moonbow Fan Club
Bit Rate's Stage.description: If you love Izzy, this is the place to be! We cover all things Izzy. Past, present, and what to expect in the future from the best horse!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Closing Ceremonies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish

E Gaming.title: SSBU Battle Arena
E Gaming.description: Choose your favorite fighter and battle it out.  Drop in as you can, come play some games and have fuf.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Modern Underrated Brony Music
Neural Net's Stage.description: There have been well over 1000 original brony songs released in the year 2022. It can be quite difficult to keep up with so much content, so here is a recap of at least some of the exciting, burgeoning talent that is out there!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Cosplay 101
Neural Net's Stage.description: Cosplay 101. This panel will cover the basics of cosplay for any skill level or budget with a focus on the elements looked at by the judges during a cosplay contest.  This panel's  helpful tips will make you a more confident cosplayer and inspire your creativity.

Neural Net's Stage.title: On Building Better Worlds
Neural Net's Stage.description: Join Cynewulf and Nyronus as they discuss the pitfalls (and opportunities!) many aspiring writers find when they first begin dreaming up fictional worlds.

Neural Net's Stage.title: BlepCon: A Wholesome Community
Neural Net's Stage.panelists:
Taylor Bowe-Mcardle - TaylorBMcardle#9533
Red Card#3453 eliwood_sain#2196
Neural Net's Stage.description: Did you need to find a place to spend time with friends during the pandemic? Worry not! Taylor and MLP fans run chill events in the BlepCon Discord server that use to be the old BronyCon server everyday weekly to make you feel like you're back at a con. Come hear how they started it all!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Keeping Friendship Magic: Live!
Neural Net's Stage.panelists:
Forward Progress - Forward Progress#6891
Nova Rose - NovaRose#7242
Neural Net's Stage.description: Live from PonyFest Online, it's the Keeping Friendship Magic Podcast! Join us for a live recording of our latest episode as Forward Progress, Nova Rose, and some very special guests discuss all things fandom, social science, and how to keep friendship magic!

Neural Net's Stage.title: 12 Days of Cosplay
Neural Net's Stage.description: Celebrate the 12 days of Cosplay with this holiday celebration of some amazing MLP fandom cosplayers.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Wigworking 101
Neural Net's Stage.description: Want to know how to properly care and style your cosplay wigs? Come and join us as we go over some basic wigworking techniques and tips to help your cosplay shine!

Tabletop A.title: Twilight Sparkle's Secret ShipFic Folder Online
Tabletop A.description: Come play a game pairing different ponies with each other in a crazy competition to see who can earn points the fastest

Tabletop B.title: Try New Oneshot A Thon!
Tabletop B.description: Where players can show up anytime, pick a random game from itch.io’s One-Page RPG Jams (2020-2022), and we’ll attempt to play it! There’s a few one player and two player RPGs in here, so don’t be shy!
